mapper.select: SELECT "users".id, "users".name, "users".head, "users".sex, "users".major, "users".grade, "users".status, "users".star_prestige, "users".school, "users".clock_in, "users".last_login, "users".create_date, "users".finish_task, "group_user".contribution, "group_user".add_time FROM "users" join group_user on "users".id = group_user.group_user where group_user.group_id = #{groupId}
